subject: right today no additional charges will be placed Rupert
body:
The foundation of justice is good faith.

To rule is not so much a question of the heavy hand as the firm seat.


I don't think anything is unrealistic if you believe you can do it.

To be in love is merely to be in a perpetual state of anesthesia.

Panic is a sudden desertion of us, and a going over to the enemy of our imagination.

If a little dreaming is dangerous, the cure for it is not to dream less but to dream more, to dream all the time.

If you chase two rabbits, both will escape.

It's not how much we give but how much love we put into giving.

It's not necessary to blow out your neighbor's light to let your own shine.

For what is a poem, but a hazardous attempt at self-understanding. It is the deepest part of autobiography.

Be content to be what you are, and prefer nothing to it, and do not fear or wish for your last day.

One had better die fighting against injustice than die like a dog or a rat in a trap.

Skillful listening is the best remedy for loneliness, loquaciousness, and laryngitis.
